bibl.title: Patriarchs and Politics in Constantinople in the Reign of Anastasius (with a Reedition of O.Mon.Epiph. 59).
bibl.note: The fall of Euphemius. - The fall of Macedonius. - The first letter of Severus to Soterichus. - The second letter of Severus to Soterichus (O. Mon. Epiphan. 59 [= LDAB 112556]). - Concluding remarks. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Millennium. Jahrbuch zu Kultur und Geschichte des ersten Jahrtausends n.Chr.

bibl.seg: Jitse Dijkstra & Geoffrey Greatrex, Patriarchs and Politics in Constantinople in the Reign of Anastasius (with a Reedition of O.Mon.Epiph. 59).

The fall of Euphemius. - The fall of Macedonius. - The first letter of Severus to Soterichus. - The second letter of Severus to Soterichus (O. Mon. Epiphan. 59 [= LDAB 112556]). - Concluding remarks. - Avec résumé en anglais.
